title: Internships after 2nd sem
content: How achievable is it to get an internship in a small startup after 2nd sem? Is it advisable to do an internship during the summer break (as we have a break of only a month) or should i rather focus on doing a certification from coursera udemy etc?

comments.body:
Small Startups Usually look for some proof of work(projects , previous experiences or some certificates).  
Look at the requirements of the internship and check if you have the required skill set or proof of work.  
  
Personally i suggest you to explore your interests , get your hands dirty. One month internship wont be worth much but finding what field your into early is better.  
  
Certifications from coursera, udemy dont mean much if you dont code along or build something of your own from whatever thing your learning.

So,Find out what you like(Web dev / App dev / ML / Statistics / low level coding) and work on it.
